timeline.bodyText: Since processRequest is already over 700 lines, this block should definitely go in a subroutine
timeline.author: btangmu

timeline.bodyText:
It would be great to avoid a new nested function here. The enclosing anonymous function is too large already, over 200 lines. New js functions should go in strict js files. Maybe a new file CldrStHelp.js, with an IIFE pattern?
Also the indentation is messed up, and that's partly a consequence of survey.js already being so messed up -- another reason to minimize the code added to it
timeline.author: btangmu

timeline.message:
CLDR-8802 Fetch DBPedia abstracts, show in info panel

- new cldr-rdf project, to keep the dependencies out of other tools
- add AbstractFetcher using Jena
- adding a cache provider that stores into 2 properties files under tools/cldr-rdf/abstracts/
- move helpHtml.jsp into SurveyAjax
- add DBPedia abstracts alongside helpHtml
- add a deferred help section with the language information
- For now: only non-comprehensive languages.  Batch process for fetching.
